channel.title: Looking for an old game (or at least name)?
channel.description: So one of my friends is looking for an old (probably DOS) FPS game, but neither of us know the title. Here's his description: [quote] you are some kind of robot(?) you have 2 laser guns and you float around instead of walking, and you begin in a place with dark blue ambience... I don't know it's something like that... as you go further through the level, you would see someone just walking around up above you with red laser barrier as his window(?) anyway... you go further and you encounter kind of robotic enemies [/quote] Sorry it's really vague, but he doesn't remember much.

item.title: Looking for an old game (or at least name)?
item.dc:creator: MSKyuuni
item.description:
Could be it too. He said “old pc game”, he didn’t specify if it was Windows or DOS.

EDIT: That’s it! Thanks Dreadmoth.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for an old game (or at least name)?
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
I looked through the list of DOS sci-fi FPS games on MobyGames and ended up with these possible results:

Blam! Machinehead
Tunnel B1
Skaphander: Der Auftrag

/shrugs

“you float around instead of walking” - Descent-like flight or hovering around near the ground?

Read full topic

item.description:
So one of my friends is looking for an old (probably DOS) FPS game, but neither of us know the title. Here’s his description:

you are some kind of robot(?) you have 2 laser guns and you float around instead of walking, and you begin in a place with dark blue ambience… I don’t know it’s something like that… as you go further through the level, you would see someone just walking around up above you with red laser barrier as his window(?) anyway… you go further and you encounter kind of robotic enemies

Sorry it’s really vague, but he doesn’t remember much.
